author: Esther Emma
content:
after three years, three months and three days of concequently posting images each day of each day, i won't blame you or the weather. ðŸ™‚
i wouldn't dare.

rather, i'm always been surprised, you managed to place such incredible images on every days basis.
so take the time you need for your time-out. in this time of year almost everyone has less or more blue monday feelings, i suppose. ðŸ™‚

but don't stay away for ever, cause i'll gonna miss you badly. ðŸ™‚
it has become a part of my life too, looking forward what you captured this time for us. 
it's a bit like i'm in vienna too. 

and i even think, vienna will be very familiar to me, the day i will visit her in real time. ðŸ™‚

have a good week, andreas
